subject: Books and Literature
Baseball
lead_paragraph: When he began work on “Ty Cobb: A Terrible Beauty,” Charles Leerhsen expected to uncover “new examples of monstrous monstrosity.” But the man and the myth did not line up.
snippet: When he began work on “Ty Cobb: A Terrible Beauty,” Charles Leerhsen expected to uncover “new examples of monstrous monstrosity.” But the man and the myth did not line up.
